posts.post_content:
This may be a long shot, but I'd like to trade my T222 Lee Magee for a T206 Red Background Cobb in GD (2) condition. Graded is preferred, but open to a raw card as long as it is guaranteed to receive a full grade e.g. not just authentic.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=587&pictureid=18970[/IMG]

PM or email, [url]shernan30@gmail.com[/url], if you have any interest in trading.

Thanks for looking, 

Steven
